Key:
Tohka... Her stomach was growling from time to
time during class... I bet she's really hungry,
but...

(The bento's beyond saving... Maybe she's in the
lunchroom?)
(All right! I'll go see!)
(Hm... She doesn't seem to be here...)

Oh my, Itsuka-kun, did you chase after me to get a
glimpse of my sweet rear" view?"

You idiot. Who would want to see that?
Have you seen Tohka?

Tohka-chan? No, I haven't seen her...
I thought she was with you?

No, she isn't...
Oh well, thanks, Tonomachi.

Course. We should eat lunch together
once in a while!
Yeah!
(Now then, where's Tohka...?)

(Seriously, where did Tohka go?
Is she really not going to have lunch?)

(Either way, I'll try searching
inside the school...)

(*Sigh*... It's no good. She's nowhere to be
found... I guess it's just the rooftop now...)
(All right, I'll try going to see...)

(Sh-She's not here... Lunch is almost going
to end, too...)
Oh, Itsuka-kun, what's wrong? Why are you rushing?

Oh, Tama―I mean, sensei!
Have you seen Tohka?

Oh, um... Yatogami-san said she would be going
home early―
Sh-She went home early?!

Y-Yes... I heard just now from Murasame-sensei
that she wasn't feeling well, so I was worried
about her, too.
(F-From Reine-san?!)
Th-Thank you! Tama―I mean, sensei!

Ah, Itsuka-kun...! Did something happen?!
Wait! It's dangerous to run in the hallway!
R-Reine-san!
Hm? Shin, what's the matter?

What do you mean, what's the matter! What's going
on? Tohka started feeling sick and went home
early?

She's been acting strange since this morning!
She didn't eat breakfast or lunch―
Mmrph!
Urh...!
Have you calmed down, Shin?
I-I'm not calm at all! What are you doing?!

Oh, is that so? Kotori told me that this would
work the best for you...

Uh... P-Please don't be fooled by that kind of
information! More importantly, Reine-san...
What's wrong with Tohka?
Oh, I allowed Tohka to go home early.

What?! Then, she really did go home?
But... Why...?!

Hmmm. Usually, when Tohka is near your side, she's
stable.
U-Usually...? Then what about now?

Now, when she's near you...
her stress levels rise.
What?!

There are times when you try too hard to get close
to each other, and a misunderstanding is born.

However, in the rare event that it could lead to
her losing control, I believed it would bring
danger to you.

I sent her home early in order to temporarily put
distance between you both. Was that unnecessary?
N-No, I don't think so, but...
Shin, have you heard of the porcupine's dilemma?
N-No...
Then, try imagining a porcupine couple.
O-Okay...

Because they love each other, they get closer in
order to be together. The needles covering their
bodies for protection end up hurting the other...

Even though they love each other, they find it
onerous to get close. Don't you think this happens
sometimes with humans and Spirits as well?

They love each other but can't get close...
B-But... then those porcupines can never be
together, no matter how much time passes?
That's actually not the case.

Through trial and error, you find a way to not
hurt the other as well as yourself. A comfortable
distance where you can feel each other's warmth.

Shin, in order to be able to stay with each other
in the long run, it's necessary to hurt each
other.

A-Are you saying... Tohka and I are
at that stage now?

Who knows. That isn't something I can decide.
That depends on what you do in the future,
doesn't it?
The perfect distance, for both of us...

R-Reine-san! Thank you! To be honest, I can't
say that I understood everything you just said,
but I want to try doing what I can, in my own way!

Mm. Everything is up to your feelings.
Also, make sure not to rush things.
Y-Yes! Please excuse me, then!
